Novels and Other Literature
=========================

This section documents the novels and other general literature available in the repository.

Four Thousand Weeks
------------------
- **File**: ``literature-pdfs/novels/pdfcoffee.com+four-thousand-weeks.pdf.pdf``
- **Description**: A book exploring time management and productivity concepts
- **Key Topics**:
  * Time management
  * Productivity
  * Personal development
